DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Women age 18 . Urgency incontinence ( least 3 time per week ) > 3months History elevate A1C Type II diabetes ( UUI+IR IR group ) Nonpregnant At least 6 month since recent childbirth Exclusion criterion : Active pregnancy , within 6 month childbirth Breastfeeding Proteinuria ( define > 1+ protein urine dipstick absence infection ) Gross hematuria ( absence UTI ) Type I diabetes mellitus Type II diabetes chronic renal impairment ( Cr > 1.5 ) Chronic renal disease ( include vasculitis , focal segmental glomerulosclerosis , lupus nephritis , polycystic kidney disease , nephropathy ) Receiving chemotherapy radiation malignancy Taking one follow drug influence DNA methylation : hydralazine , procainamide , methotrexate , valproic acid , tamoxifen , raloxifene , letrozole , anastrozole ( Arimidex ) , exemestane ( Aromasin ) Any history urinary tract malignancy ( bladder , urethra , ureter , kidney ) Intradetrusor Botox injection within prior 12 month
